column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The Pistachio Almond
column3: and in its flavor. Inside that flaky exterior is a wonderful surprise! Pistachio AND almond paste fills the center of the croissant
column4: and is enough to not be overbearing
column5: but enough to give extra flavors of pistachio to the croissant. The Almond Croissant is the bakery's real winner
column6: and I am willing to bet that anybody who can appreciate a good croissant will agree. I have never had a better croissant
column7: and I find myself thinking about this particular one every once in a while since I've had it.
